overview: Featuring a medley of vintage performances, this compilation showcases the genius of illustrious French violinist Christian Ferras, accompanied by the Radio Canada Orchestra under the baton of maestro Alexander Brott. Selections include Claude Debussy's Sonata for Violin and Piano in G Minor, Maurice Ravel's Tzigane for Violin and Piano, Béla Bartók's Sonata for Violin and Piano no. 2 and Felix Mendelssohn's Violin Concerto in E Minor, op. 64.
title: Christian Ferras in Recital
